input.sentences: everyone was coming over to the apartment for a halloween party .
we had made a great halloween spread out of delicious snacks .
everyone arrived and started having a great time .
everybody was fully decked out in halloween costumes .
i was so happy that everyone had an awesome time .
output.sentences: Everyone was excited that Halloween was coming and couldn't wait for the party.
On the night of the party there were different types of Halloween snacks spread out.
At the time the party started the guests arrived.
Everyone was decked out in fun Halloween costumes.
Everyone was happy and had an awesome time at the party.
